block.tfmg.accumulator.tooltip.summary: 存储大量能量，从顶部输入，从底部缓慢释放
block.tfmg.aluminum_lamp.tooltip.behavio: 亮度随接收的电力强度变化
当发光时，颜色会变成与染料相同的颜色
block.tfmg.blast_stove.tooltip.behaviour: 当3个热风炉垂直堆叠（或以3x2形式排列）时，即构成最小规格的热风炉装置。如需扩大内部存储容量，通常建议在顶部追加更多热风炉模块。热风炉运行需满足两项输入要求：空气从底层模块侧面注入，杂酚油或炉气从底部注入。同时需从底层模块侧面排出二氧化碳，并从装置顶部输出加热后的空气。
block.tfmg.cable_connector.tooltip.behav: 在两个接线柱之间建立了电力传输连接
block.tfmg.cable_connector.tooltip.condi: 当使用铜/铝/康铜线轴右键点击两个接线柱时触发
block.tfmg.casting_basin.tooltip.behavio: 生产铸铁，且必须保持足够的输出速度，因熔炉内部存储空间有限
block.tfmg.circular_light.tooltip.behavi: 亮度随接收的电力强度变化
当发光时，颜色会变成与染料相同的颜色
block.tfmg.cocrete_hose.tooltip.summary: 用软管滑轮将混凝土泵入钢筋格栅中，浇筑后的混凝土会硬化形成钢筋混凝土。
block.tfmg.converter.tooltip.behaviour1: 该方块默认具有一个TFMG能量输入接口（铜）和一个FE输入接口（红石），默认将TFMG能量转换为FE。使用扳手可切换为将FE转换为TFMG能量。TFMG输出的电压可通过转换器侧面的菜单 进行调整。
block.tfmg.converter.tooltip.summary: 可将FE能量与TFMG能量互相转换
block.tfmg.diode.tooltip.behaviour1: 电能将从较亮的一侧输出，作为单向能量通道（即从较亮一侧输入的能量不会从较暗侧输出）
block.tfmg.diode.tooltip.condition1: 当从较暗的一侧供电时
block.tfmg.diode.tooltip.summary: 作为单向电力传输通道
block.tfmg.electrical_switch.tooltip.sum: 红石信号激活时允许能量通过
block.tfmg.engine_controller.tooltip.beh: 右键使用传动部件点击控制器，然后对引擎执行相同操作
在Minecraft设置的键位绑定部分查看，特别是Create: The Factory Must Grow模组选项
block.tfmg.engine_controller.tooltip.sum: 控制各类引擎产生的旋转速度与方向
block.tfmg.firebox.tooltip.behaviour1: 加热其上方的机械，起到烈焰人燃烧器的作用
block.tfmg.firebox.tooltip.condition1: 当注入液化石油气、丁烷、柴油、丙烷、石脑油或煤油时，需排出二氧化碳
block.tfmg.firebox.tooltip.summary: 当燃料泵入时，加热上方机械
block.tfmg.fireclay.tooltip.summary: 生成于主世界的地下矿脉中
block.tfmg.flarestack.tooltip.behaviour1: 将泵入的内容物彻底清除！
block.tfmg.flarestack.tooltip.condition1: 当从底部泵入可燃性流体/气体时
block.tfmg.glass_cable_insulator.tooltip: 在两个绝缘接线柱之间建立了电力传输连接
当使用铜/铝/康铜线轴右键点击两个绝缘接线柱时
block.tfmg.heavy_casing_encased_aluminum: 重型外壳封装铝制齿轮
block.tfmg.heavy_casing_encased_large_al: 重型外壳封装大型铝制齿轮
block.tfmg.heavy_casing_encased_large_st: 重型外壳封装大型钢制齿轮
block.tfmg.heavy_casing_encased_steel_co: 重型外壳封装钢制齿轮
block.tfmg.large_engine.tooltip.behaviou: 需泵入空气和燃料（柴油、煤油、石脑油、炉气）并排出二氧化碳（需配备排气口）以产生应力（需像蒸汽引擎一样连接传动轴）
block.tfmg.large_engine.tooltip.summary: 利用低纯度燃料产生应力
block.tfmg.large_pumpjack_hammer_connect: 大型抽油机曲柄连杆机构
block.tfmg.light_blue_rebar_concrete_sla: 淡蓝色钢筋混凝土台阶
block.tfmg.light_blue_rebar_concrete_sta: 淡蓝色钢筋混凝土楼梯
block.tfmg.light_bulb.tooltip.behaviour1: 亮度随接收的电力强度变化
block.tfmg.light_bulb.tooltip.behaviour2: 当发光时，颜色会变成与染料相同的颜色
block.tfmg.light_gray_rebar_concrete_sla: 淡灰色钢筋混凝土台阶
block.tfmg.light_gray_rebar_concrete_sta: 淡灰色钢筋混凝土楼梯
block.tfmg.lime_rebar_concrete_slab: 黄绿色钢筋混凝土台阶
block.tfmg.lime_rebar_concrete_stairs: 黄绿色钢筋混凝土楼梯
block.tfmg.magenta_rebar_concrete_slab: 品红色钢筋混凝土台阶
block.tfmg.magenta_rebar_concrete_stairs: 品红色钢筋混凝土楼梯
block.tfmg.modern_light.tooltip.behaviou: 亮度随接收的电力强度变化
当发光时，颜色会变成与照射光相同的颜色
block.tfmg.neon_tube.tooltip.behaviour1: 亮度随接收的电力强度变化
block.tfmg.neon_tube.tooltip.behaviour2: 当发光时，颜色会变成与染料相同的颜色
block.tfmg.neon_tube.tooltip.behaviour3: 改变形状以提供灯管供电空间
block.tfmg.pink_rebar_concrete_slab: 粉红色钢筋混凝土台阶
block.tfmg.pink_rebar_concrete_stairs: 粉红色钢筋混凝土楼梯
block.tfmg.polarizer.tooltip.behaviour1: 当用磁性合金锭右击后，经过一段时间会将磁化锭转化为磁铁
block.tfmg.polarizer.tooltip.summary: 将磁性合金锭转化为磁铁
block.tfmg.potentiometer.tooltip.behavio: 根据设定的百分比，该机器仅允许通过其输出端（顶部箭头标识方向）的部分电压。
block.tfmg.potentiometer.tooltip.summary: 仅允许通过设定的电压
block.tfmg.resistor.tooltip.behaviour1: 将电阻器对应的电阻值（查看绕线机提示以了解如何调整阻值）添加到目标方块所在的电路组中
block.tfmg.resistor.tooltip.condition1: 当放置在电路组中的方块上时
block.tfmg.simple_large_engine.tooltip.b: 需注入空气与燃料（柴油/煤油/石脑油/炉气）并排出二氧化碳（需配备排气口）以产生应力（需像蒸汽引擎一样连接传动轴）
block.tfmg.simple_large_engine.tooltip.s: 利用低纯度燃料产生旋转动力（效率低于常规型号）
block.tfmg.surface_scanner.tooltip.behav: 该机器顶部的5x5网格显示以自身区块为中心的周围区块，含有至少1处石油矿藏的区块会高亮显示。若几秒后仍未高亮，则表明附近无石油矿藏。游戏中可按F3+G键显示区块边界
block.tfmg.surface_scanner.tooltip.condi: 当下方通过机器输入口供电时
block.tfmg.surface_scanner.tooltip.summa: 用于定位含石油的区块
block.tfmg.transformer.tooltip.behaviour: 需要两个不同匝数的电磁线圈安装在变压器上，输出端（以铜线标记）的电压由两线圈的匝数比决定（例如：输入线圈50匝，输出线圈100匝，则电压翻倍，因100/50=2）
block.tfmg.voltage_observer.tooltip.summ: 检测到任意电压时激活红石信号
block.tfmg.voltmeter.tooltip.behaviour1: 使用时将此方块放置于电力设备/元件上。默认测量范围为0-500伏特。佩戴工程师护目镜可查看当前测量值。右键使用扳手可选择测量类型
block.tfmg.voltmeter.tooltip.summary: 显示电力元件的各类参数数值
block.tfmg.winding_machine.tooltip.behav: 右键使用目标物品（电磁线圈或电阻器），随后对线圈右键使用铜线轴，对电阻器右键使用铝线轴。与之交互可设置匝数/欧姆值并通过旋转供能。佩戴工程师护目镜可查看绕线完成状态
block.tfmg.winding_machine.tooltip.summa: 改变线轴的匝数及电阻器的阻值
creative_tab.tfmg_decoration: 机械动力：工业长路丨建筑方块
item.tfmg.advanced_potato_cannon.tooltip: 从物品栏发射凝固汽油土豆
不消耗耐久度，而是消耗储气罐中的气压
向敌人发射凝固汽油土豆，可通过背置储气罐的气压供能
item.tfmg.black_multimeter.tooltip.behav: 显示电阻（欧姆）、电压（伏特）、电流（安培）和功率（千瓦），并标注元件所属电路组
除上述参数外，万用表还会显示电路网络的总发电量与耗电量
item.tfmg.black_multimeter.tooltip.condi: 注视电力元件时生效（注：佩戴工程师护目镜时不可用）
潜行状态下注视电力元件时
item.tfmg.black_multimeter.tooltip.summa: 显示电力方块及其所属网络的数据

item.tfmg.electrictians_wrench.tooltip.b: 开启菜单以选择设定方块的组别（组别说明详见发电机沉思功能）
item.tfmg.flamethrower.tooltip.behaviour: 燃料将从储罐中消耗，射程与扩散范围随所选燃料类型变化
item.tfmg.flamethrower.tooltip.condition: 当右键点击装有有效燃料的流体容器时
item.tfmg.flamethrower.tooltip.summary: 通过燃烧可燃气体与流体，喷射火焰灼烧敌人

潜行状态下注视电力元件时
item.tfmg.yellow_multimeter.tooltip.summ: 显示电力方块及其所属网络的数据
tfmg.goggles.pumpjack.wrong_rotation1: The Pumpjack Base is oriented incorrectly, the red marker must
tfmg.goggles.pumpjack.wrong_rotation2: face away from the Pumpjack Hammer Holder
tfmg.ponder.blast_furnace.text_1: Main part of a blast furnace is a blast furnace output
tfmg.ponder.blast_furnace.text_2: To build a blast furnace, make a cylinder of fireproof bricks around it with one blast furnace hatch in it
tfmg.ponder.blast_furnace.text_3: This hatch will function as a hot air input
tfmg.ponder.blast_furnace.text_4: Blast furnaces need reinforcements to function
tfmg.ponder.blast_furnace.text_5: Everything is inserted to through a hole at the top
tfmg.ponder.blast_furnace.text_6: Next hatch can be placed on the top hole to collect furnace gas, items directed into it will fall into the blast furnace
tfmg.ponder.blast_furnace.text_7: Blast furnace reinforcements can be placed around the furnace to increase its speed
tfmg.ponder.chemical_vat.text_1: The chemical vat is a machine with attachments that can give it many different uses
tfmg.ponder.chemical_vat.text_2: First attachment is the industrial mixer
tfmg.ponder.chemical_vat.text_3: When the mixer blade is inserted, the vat becomes a mixer
tfmg.ponder.chemical_vat.text_4: The industrial mixer can also become a centrifuge
tfmg.ponder.chemical_vat.text_6: Placing 2 electrode holders with copper electrodes creates an electrolyzer
tfmg.ponder.chemical_vat.text_7: 3 graphite electrodes create a blast furnace
tfmg.ponder.coke_oven.text_1: The Coke Oven is a machine that produces coal coke from coal
tfmg.ponder.coke_oven.text_2: It is very slow so it is beneficial to have long arrays of them
tfmg.ponder.coke_oven.text_3: Coal can be inserted from anywhere
tfmg.ponder.coke_oven.text_4: Carbon Dioxide is extracted at the top, Creosote can be extracted anywhere else
tfmg.ponder.coke_oven.text_5: After some time, coal coke will fall out of the machine
tfmg.ponder.distillation_tower.text_1: The base of a distillation tower is comprised of steel tanks
tfmg.ponder.distillation_tower.text_2: Tower is assembled by placing Steel Distillation Controller next to the tanks
tfmg.ponder.distillation_tower.text_3: To finish the multiblock, place up to 6 Distillation outputs and Industrial Pipes between them
tfmg.ponder.distillation_tower.text_4: Place a heat source under the tanks to power it, the dial on the tower shows the power level of the structure
tfmg.ponder.distillation_tower.text_5: Oil is inputted into the controller block
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_1: A generator creates 2 values, Voltage and Power
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_10: Groups can be changed using the Configuration Wrench
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_11: Blocks in their own group keep all the voltage
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_2:
Generator:
   Voltage(U) = 200V
   Max Power = 8kW
Light Bulb:
   Voltage(U) = 200V
   Current(I) = 2A
   Power(P) = 100W
   Resistance(R) = 100Ω
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_3: When load is applied on a generator, it takes its voltage
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_4: Every an electric device has electrical resistance, light bulbs are 100 Ohm(Ω)
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_5: Current with size of Voltage divided by Resistance will start flowing in the light bulb
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_6:
Generator:
   Voltage(U) = 200V
   Max Power = 8kW
Light Bulb 1:
   Voltage(U) = 100V
   Current(I) = 1A
   Resistance(R) = 100Ω
   Group=0
Light Bulb 2:
   Voltage(U) = 100V
   Current(I) = 1A
   Resistance(R) = 100Ω
   Group=0
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_7: Electric components can be connected with groups, by default all blocks are group 0
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_8: Blocks that share a group split voltage between them(blocks with higher resistance get more of the split voltage)
tfmg.ponder.electricity.text_9:
Generator:
   Voltage(U) = 200V
   Max Power = 8kW
Light Bulb 1:
   Voltage(U) = 200V
   Current(I) = 2A
   Resistance(R) = 100Ω
   Group=1
Light Bulb 2:
   Voltage(U) = 200V
   Current(I) = 2A
   Resistance(R) = 100Ω
   Group=0
tfmg.ponder.electricity_two.text_1: Some blocks have connections from 2 sides
tfmg.ponder.electricity_two.text_2: These blocks create a new electric network on one of their sides
tfmg.ponder.electricity_two.text_3: This subnetwork will get all the power from the main network but not the opposite way
tfmg.ponder.electricity_two.text_4: The most basic block with this ability is the Diode, it has no other extra abilities
tfmg.ponder.electricity_two.text_5: Next one is the potentiometer, this one can set the percentage of voltage that gets to the subnetwork
tfmg.ponder.electricity_two.text_6: The switch works similarly but with redstone
tfmg.ponder.electricity_two.text_7: The transformer changes voltage based on the ratio of turns between the primary and secondary coil
tfmg.ponder.encased_fluid_pipe.text_1: Copper Casing can be used to decorate Fluid Pipes
tfmg.ponder.encased_fluid_pipe.text_2: Aside from being concealed, Encased Pipes are locked into their connectivity state
tfmg.ponder.encased_fluid_pipe.text_3: It will no longer react to any neighbouring blocks being added or removed
tfmg.ponder.engines.text_1: To build an engine, start by placing up to 5 engine blocks in a line
tfmg.ponder.engines.text_2: The engine's tooltip will show you items needed for the assembly
tfmg.ponder.engines.text_3: Engine configuration can be changed with a schematic
tfmg.ponder.engines.text_4: Next step is inserting the cylinders (or turbine blades in turbine engines)
tfmg.ponder.engines.text_5: Shafts are inserted by right clicking
tfmg.ponder.engines.text_6: Fuel input and exhaust output can be done from any block
tfmg.ponder.engines.text_7: Every engine block can be right clicked with certain items to be upgraded
tfmg.ponder.engines.text_8: For example industrial pipes make the engine consume fuel from neighboring tanks
tfmg.ponder.engines.text_9: The engine can be started with a redstone signal
tfmg.ponder.fluid_pipe_flow.text_1: Fluid Pipes can connect two or more fluid sources and targets
tfmg.ponder.fluid_pipe_flow.text_2: Using a wrench, a straight pipe segment can be given a window
tfmg.ponder.fluid_pipe_flow.text_3: Windowed pipes will not connect to any other adjacent pipe segments
tfmg.ponder.fluid_pipe_flow.text_4: Powered by Mechanical Pumps, the Pipes can transport Fluids
tfmg.ponder.fluid_pipe_flow.text_5: No fluid is being extracted at first
tfmg.ponder.fluid_pipe_flow.text_6: Once the flow connects them, the endpoints gradually transfer their contents
tfmg.ponder.fluid_pipe_flow.text_7: Thus, the Pipe blocks themselves never 'physically' contain any fluid
tfmg.ponder.fluid_pipe_interaction.text_: Endpoints of a pipe network can interact with a variety of blocks
Any block with fluid storage capabilities can be filled or drained
Source blocks right in front of an open end can be picked up...
...while spilling into empty spaces can create fluid sources
Pipes can also extract fluids from a handful of other blocks directly
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_flow.text_1: Mechanical Pumps govern the flow of their attached pipe networks
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_flow.text_2: Their arrow indicates the direction of flow
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_flow.text_3: The network behind is now pulling fluids...
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_flow.text_4: ...while the network in front is transferring it outward
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_flow.text_5: The pumps direction is unaffected by the input rotation
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_flow.text_6: Instead, a Wrench can be used to reverse the direction
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_speed.text_1: Regardless of speed, Mechanical Pumps affect pipes connected up to 16 blocks away
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_speed.text_2: Speeding up the input rotation changes the speed of flow propagation...
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_speed.text_3: ...and the speed at which fluids are transferred
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_speed.text_4: Pumps can combine their throughputs within shared pipe networks
tfmg.ponder.mechanical_pump_speed.text_5: Ensure that all of them are facing in the same direction
tfmg.ponder.pumpjack.text_1: First step of mining oil is building industrial pipes from a deposit to the surface
tfmg.ponder.pumpjack.text_2: Pumpjack base has to be placed on the top of the pipe
tfmg.ponder.pumpjack.text_3: Pumpjack Hammer Holder needs to be placed behind it
tfmg.ponder.pumpjack.text_4: Next step is building the Connector And the Head of the Pumpjack above the crank and the base
tfmg.ponder.pumpjack.text_5: Now they need to be connected with Pumpjack Hammer Parts
tfmg.ponder.pumpjack.text_6: Make sure to Super Glue the parts together
tfmg.ponder.pumpjack.text_7: The last step is placing a machine input (which is the power input for the pumpjack) with a pumpjack crank above it
tfmg.ponder.shared.behaviour_modify_valu: This behaviour can be modified using the value panel
tfmg.ponder.shared.movement_anchors: With the help of Super Glue, larger structures can be moved.
tfmg.ponder.shared.storage_on_contraptio: Inventories attached to the Contraption will pick up their drops automatically
tfmg.ponder.smart_pipe.header: Controlling Fluid flow using Smart Pipes
tfmg.ponder.smart_pipe.text_1: Smart pipes can help control flows by fluid type
tfmg.ponder.smart_pipe.text_2: When placed directly at the source, they can specify the type of fluid to extract
tfmg.ponder.smart_pipe.text_3: Simply Right-Click their filter slot with any item containing the desired fluid
tfmg.ponder.smart_pipe.text_4: When placed further down a pipe network, smart pipes will only let matching fluids continue
tfmg.ponder.tag.chemical_vat.description: Chemical vat and machines that expand it
tfmg.ponder.tag.electric_machinery.descr: Block which use, produce or transfer electricity
tfmg.ponder.tag.engines.description: Engines and equipment related to them
tfmg.ponder.tag.oil_processing.descripti: Block used for refining and mining oil
tfmg.ponder.valve_pipe.text_1: Valve pipes help control fluids propagating through pipe networks
tfmg.ponder.valve_pipe.text_2: Their shaft input controls whether fluid is currently allowed through
tfmg.ponder.valve_pipe.text_3: Given Rotational Force in the opening direction, the valve will open up
tfmg.ponder.valve_pipe.text_4: It can be closed again by reversing the input rotation
